thread.title: Serena Williams flaunts athletic body in thong bikini for Sports Illustrated - "It's OK to look strong and be sexy"
thread.title_full: Serena Williams flaunts athletic body in thong bikini for Sports Illustrated - "It's OK to look strong and be sexy"

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Serena Williams flaunts athletic body in thong bikini for Sports Illustrated - "It's OK to look strong and be sexy"
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Serena Williams looks better than ever as she strips off for the Sports Illustrated 2017 Swimsuit Issue. 
The tennis wonder woman, 35, is flaunting her athletic body in a series of thong-style swimsuits, including a stunning bright blue one-piece. 
Proudly showing off her athletic figure, she also models a tiny yellow thong and matching bikini top as she poses in the sea. 
Speaking about the shoot, Serena said she wants people of all shapes and sizes to feel comfortable and confident in their skin. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQiSEy2AwFk/?taken-by=serenawilliams&hl=en/embed 
"I want people to come away with the fact that it’s okay to be comfortable in your body. I’m not a size two. It’s okay to look good and feel good and I’m strong. It’s okay to look strong and to be sexy and to be a woman and to be unbreakable — all those things," she said in a filmed interview for the magazine. (Photo: Getty Images) Serena Williams poses with the Australian Open trophy (Photo: Getty) 
"I really want to have that influence for people out there that have my body type. I want them to be like, 'I look good too.' That’s what I hope for." 
The tennis star added that it took a while to get used to posing in such a skimpy pair of bottoms. 
"I’ve never worn a thong bikini, so for that to be my first shot was like a shot of espresso for me because I had to wake up immediately." 
She continued: "The thong is perfect, it really made me feel comfortable. I'm officially a thong girl now!" Like us on Facebook
